Uses of Interface
imagingbook.spectral.dct.Dct2d

Packages that use Dct2d
Package
Description
imagingbook.spectral.dct
1D and 2D implementations of the Discrete Cosine Transform.

  • Uses of Dct2d in imagingbook.spectral.dct

    Subinterfaces of Dct2d in imagingbook.spectral.dct
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    Dct2d.Double
    Sub-interface for 2D DCT implementations operating on double data.
    static interface 
    Dct2d.Float
    Sub-interface for 2D DCT implementations operating on float data.
    Classes in imagingbook.spectral.dct that implement Dct2d
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Dct2dDirect
    Direct (slow) implementation of the 2-dimensional DCT using tabulated cosine values.
    static class 
    Dct2dDirect.Double
    Two-dimensional DCT implementation using double data.
    static class 
    Dct2dDirect.Float
    Two-dimensional DCT implementation using float data.
    class 
    Dct2dFast
    Fast implementation of the 2-dimensional DCT.
    static class 
    Dct2dFast.Double
    Two-dimensional DCT implementation using double data.
    static class 
    Dct2dFast.Float
    Two-dimensional DCT implementation using float data.
